briefTitle: GF-GS 01: Comparing Conventional Axillary Dissection Versus Sentinel Node Resection in Clinically Node-negative Operable Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Randomized, Phase III Clinical Trial GF-GS 01 to Compare Conventional Axillary Dissection Versus Sentinel Node Resection (GS) in Clinically Node-negative Operable Breast Cancer Unifocal N0 Patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women older than 18 years with clinically node-negative operable unifocal N0 breast cancer (clinical tumour size \< 30 mm).
* Written consent is obtained from all patients before randomization.
